content: I've successfully set up VS Code with all the recommended extensions. I've also configured the integrated terminal and installed the Live Server extension for testing HTML files. Everything is working perfectly!
Here's my HTML document structure assignment. I've created a basic HTML5 document with proper DOCTYPE, head section with meta tags and title, and a body with semantic elements.
I followed the setup instructions but I'm having trouble with the Live Server extension. It doesn't seem to be working properly when I try to preview my HTML files.
I've created an HTML page using various elements including headings, paragraphs, lists, and images. I've also experimented with semantic HTML5 elements like article and section.
